title: WTA roundup: Sofia Kenin collects upset in Tokyo
content: Sofia Kenin knocked out 10th-seeded Xinyu Wang of China 6-1, 6-4 in the first round of the Toray Pan Pacific Open on Tuesday in Tokyo.

title: 3 Industrial Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy With $600 and Hold Forever
content: For buy-and-hold investors, success is found in diverse companies that can produce year after year.
